questions.question: Which programming language is known as the 'mother of all programming languages'?
questions.feedback: Assembly language is considered the 'mother of all programming languages' as it's the lowest-level programming language that is still readable by humans.

questions.question: What is the brain of the computer called?
questions.feedback: The CPU (Central Processing Unit) is considered the brain of the computer as it processes all instructions.

questions.question: Which type of software provides a platform for other software to run?
questions.feedback: An Operating System provides a platform and interface for other software to run on a computer.
